title: When the supports get in a fight
body:
When they are actually supports:
https://media.giphy.com/media/c4t11obaChpu0/giphy.gif

When they are "Supports" (I see that Rabadon's Lux):
https://boardgamegeek.com/camo/a2bdb7ad21476bea06584197091ca92a42a94218/687474703a2f2f617765736f6d6570686f746f73686f707065722e66696c65732e776f726470726573732e636f6d2f323031332f30312f692d616d2d6e6f742d6c6566742d68616e6465642e676966
http://lovelace-media.imgix.net/uploads/191/3dc2b580-f8b8-0132-f419-0e18518aac2f.gif?

replies.body:
I had a game where i was dueling {{champion:25}} as {{champion:117}} in the bush. 
We ended up killing eachother and everyone was just laughing at how "savage" of supports we were.

Remember Gangplank support?

{{champion:41}}  *Throws pistol aside* I DON'T NEED A GUN *holds up cutlass* I'M GONNA KIIIILL YOU NOOOOOW
Supportplank was amazing, and second only to Trollplank (AP Tank gangplank before his rework).
AP Plank lmfaooo I'm almost tempted to go into my match history and dig deep for that one game I tried it.

Support TrollPlank was hilariously fun.

If anything, that's what I miss most about old GP.
You could build literally anything [within reason] on him and not be trolling.

Ah, the good 'ol days.
Let off some steam, Gangplank. {{champion:122}}

First Example:{{champion:16}} vs{{champion:267}} 
Second Example:{{champion:53}} vs{{champion:63}}
{{champion:23}} You don't say!

HAHAHAHAHA silly fish
{{champion:78}} sup be like:
http://giphy.com/gifs/cgjFbQlsQNT2M/html5
That first gif is pure dynamite .......
EEEEUUUUNNNGH
All I can think of is this after reading the title alone XD https://youtu.be/qGeggzmnxdY
brand "support"
Blitz? Why do you have two spellblade items? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
More like top lane trades
then there's {{champion:223}} support. nothing like going into a 1v2 as the support and coming out with a double kill
{{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:412}}  you're welcome
So when supports fight. {{champion:7}} "support" vs {{champion:55}} "support"

I know critplank is still a thing, but I kinda miss the old version.  The new GP doesn't really feel as good with the Q. 

It's all about the barrels now if you know what I mean.
